conversion_verification.notes: All mandatory 3D conversion criteria are met, indicating a strong foundational transformation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation with clear height, thickness, and interior volume. The viewing angle is perfectly angled, and the cutaway treatment is clean and effective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room configuration, adjacency, and relative proportions are well preserved. Major wall positions are accurate. Some minor discrepancies in door/window placement and proportions.

interior_elements.notes: Most major furniture and fixtures are present, correctly placed, and scaled logically within the rooms. Minor changes in furniture style but overall fidelity is high.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent structural clarity with well-distinguishable elements. Lighting is good, ensuring visibility. Aesthetic coherence is consistent with no major artifacts and a clean background. Some minor material inconsistencies.

summary: The 2D floor plan has been converted into a geometrically faithful and aesthetically pleasing 3D isometric cutaway model, demonstrating excellent conversion quality.
